thread.section_title: Coolicool 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Coolicool 的点评意见 | coolicool.com | 20 5
thread.title: cornelius clark
thread.title_full: Coolicool 的点评人 cornelius clark

author: cornelius clark
title: cornelius clark
text:
I was new to Coolicool so was a bit sceptical at first but the Coolicool team responded to all my emails whilst waiting for new stock to arrive.
I did attempt to cancel the order twice, but the team assured me that the phone would be delivered once received.They were true to their word.I was notified by email and received my new Mi Mix 256mb within 7 days....after weeks of waiting.
I'll definitely use Coolicool again. Love the phone!!
